Author: okokokstop
Text: I haven't had it. It looks like it's just shirataki noodles with a bit of soy added, which is why it's slightly higher calories. I would guess it's not too good since shirataki noodles aren't.   If you want something that actually has the taste/consistency of pasta, kroger has a low-calorie pasta. It's 150 calories per 2 oz instead of 200. I know it's not anywhere near as low as nuPasta, but I think it's a good option.
